pages.text: $(li)Shipwrecks are shunken ships that can be found inside of the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/ocean)Oceans$(/l) of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)The reason why they are sunk is unknown, although it is rumored that they are ships attacked by the dreaded creature of the seas, the $(l:patchouli:creatures/outvoted/kraken)Kraken$(/l).
